admin: Login as an administrator to access the dashboard to manage app data.
Login kama Admin wa shule ili uweze kuingia kwenye dashbodi ya shule
login_as_student: Login as a student to explore course materials and assignments.
Ingia kama mwanafunzi ili uweze kuona materials, kozi , matokeo na mengineyo
login_as_teacher: Login as a teacher to create courses, assignments, and track student progress.
Ingia kama mwalimu ili uweze kuandaa kozi, mazoezi na kufuatilia maendeleo ya mwanafunzi
login_as_parent: Login as a parent to monitor your child's progress and communicate with teachers.
Ingia kama mzazi/mlezi ili uweze kufuatilia maendeleo ya mtoto wako, kuwasiliana na walimu na uongozi
